title: Plat 4 Jungle main looking for a team
body:
Hey

My name is Alex but I use the name Chick3n chas4h (refernce from fable) on lol. I'm currently studying at UC in NZ and am looking for a team to join. I described in the title that I want to be a jungler for a team. I can do anything but support, I don't feel like I can do much if we're behind as the support. I've had no prior team, so I would need to be taught a few things. Invite me to some pubs and see what I'm like anyway. Free all the time, other than my lectures. Really easy to get a long with. Not a dick and hardly rage (probably get annoyed at bugs more than anything)

Anyway, thanks for readying.

IGN : Chick3n chas4h

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/392579#
